short_summary: Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services.
description: The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services under Supply Arrangement EN578-172870. Stream 5.3 - Telecommunication Analyst is a requirement. A Request for Proposal is issued to Suppliers and is open to invited suppliers generated by the Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS).
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**English Title**
---------------

NPP - S4578642 - THS SA - One (1) Telecommunication Analyst. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

**French Title**
---------------

APM - S4578642 - AMA SAT - Un (1) Volet 5.3- Analyste des politiques. Les services d'aide temporaire dans le cadre de l'arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale.

**Details**
-----------
